dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, we've got some really cool news from the Global Education and Skills Forum that happened in Dubai recently. It was March 22nd to 24th, and, um, Nurali Aliyev, founder of the ZHANARTU charity foundation, was there.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, we've got some really cool news from the Global Education and Skills Forum that happened in Dubai recently. It was March twenty second to twenty fourth, and, um, Nurali Aliyev, founder of the ZHANARTU charity foundation, was there.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On March 22 to 24, 2019, Nurali Aliyev, founder of ZHANARTU private charity foundation, was participating at the Global Education and Skills Forum in Dubai, UAE.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, yeah, the GESF. That's a huge event, right? Like, it's organized by the Varkey Foundation and itâ€™s where they do the Global Teacher Prize.

dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: GESF is organized by Varkey Foundation. This year the forum is held for the 7th time. The key highlight of the event is the Global Teacher Prize awarding ceremony.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. Super prestigious. But what's really exciting is that a team from Kazakhstan, called QamCare, they also spoke there.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. Super prestigious. But what's really exciting is that a team from Kazakhstan, called QamCare, they also spoke there.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: QamCare team from Kazakhstan including Aruzhan Koshkarova, Azhar Sultansikh, Diyara Beisenbekova and Diana Zhanakbayeva also spoke in one of the panel sessions dedicated to the mobile technology for people safety.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: QamCare, uh, isn't that the team that won the International Technovation challenge back in 2017? The one ZHANARTU supported?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: QamCare, uh, isn't that the team that won the International Technovation challenge back in twenty seventeen? The one ZHANARTU supported?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: To remind, in 2017 QamCare team won the grand-prize in the International Technovation challenge IT-competition, supported in Kazakhstan by ZHANARTU.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] That's right! They totally won the grand prize. And Nurali Aliyev's foundation actually organized their speaking opportunity at the forum this time.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's right! They totally won the grand prize. And Nurali Aliyev's foundation actually organized their speaking opportunity at the forum this time.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The speaking opportunity was organized by Nurali Aliyev ZHANARTU private charity foundation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wow, so he's still really invested in them. What, um, what did they talk about?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow, so he's still really invested in them. What, um, what did they talk about?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Well, they presented their QamCare mobile application. It's got this amazing SOS button that lets you track family members and send a detailed emergency message, like, without even using your phone.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, they presented their QamCare mobile application. It's got this amazing S O S button that lets you track family members and send a detailed emergency message, like, without even using your phone.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In the speaking session, the girls presented QamCare mobile application and its SOS button that allows to track the location of family members and to send a message to your family in seconds with detailed data about your location in case of emergency without the use of a mobile phone.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: That's incredible! Especially for, you know, peace of mind for parents.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's incredible! Especially for, you know, peace of mind for parents.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and they highlighted that it's super relevant for the education sector because their target audience is school students. So it's very much integrated.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and they highlighted that it's super relevant for the education sector because their target audience is school students. So it's very much integrated.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: During the presentation QamCare team explained that the mobile application is an integral part in the sector of education, as the target audience of the project is school students.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And it sounds like ZHANARTU's support goes way beyond just, uh, getting them a speaking slot.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And it sounds like ZHANARTU's support goes way beyond just, uh, getting them a speaking slot.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, absolutely. QamCare mentioned how incredibly thankful they are because Nurali Aliyev isn't just supporting their startup, but them personally.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, absolutely. QamCare mentioned how incredibly thankful they are because Nurali Aliyev isn't just supporting their startup, but them personally.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We are very thankful for Mr. Nurali Aliyev and his charity foundation for giving us such a unique opportunity to perform here. He also supports not only our startup idea, but also us personally.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: He offered all of them full scholarships! To his own Bachelor of Informational Systems in Business program at KIMEP University.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: He offered all of them full scholarships! To his own Bachelor of Informational Systems in Business program at K I M E P University.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: All of us were offered with a full scholarship in his Nurali Aliyev Bachelor of Informational Systems in Business academic program at KIMEP University, one of the prominent universities in Central Asia, concluded Aruzhan Koshkarova from QamCare team.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: That's an amazing opportunity! So, like, ZHANARTU's whole goal is really to support this new generation of IT talent in Kazakhstan.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's an amazing opportunity! So, like, ZHANARTU's whole goal is really to support this new generation of I T talent in Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. It's fantastic to see that kind of, um, long-term commitment to these young innovators.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally. It's fantastic to see that kind of, um, long-term commitment to these young innovators.
